description: 've been anxious to get a redhead onto the site but the ones we met so far had fair skin and freckles that didn't photograph well. Then I met Shane - or as we refer to him now, 'Opie Taylor Gone Studly'.As you can see, there's nothing about this 24 year old hunk that's ordinary. Working and playing outdoors has him tan and hours in the gym make him buff. As for that long, thick pole under those flame colored pubes, can't credit that anything but the luck of the Irish. Damn, it's a whopper and with heavy hang that makes your mouth water.That tattoo under his dick says ?Slow Ride 69? and no doubt, it would take a while to get anything that big all the way inside. But if he rides a hole like he rides fist & shoots as much sperm inside as he does while whacking for our cameras, its one long wet ride you will never want to end.
title: Big Red, Scene #01
